'''Harold Eric Riddett''' ([[1905]]-[[1990]]), commonly known as '''H.E. Riddett''', was a British artist. He is noteworthy for adding colour to many black-and-white maps and drawings in several posthumous [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] publications, most notably in many editions of ''[[The Hobbit]]'' and illustrated editions of ''[[The Silmarillion]]''.
